personal_info.name: Tiziano Martinelli
personal_info.about_me: I am a student in Computer Science at the National University of San Antonio de Areco and self-taught in technologies such as React, Ionic and TypeScript. Passionate about creating web and mobile applications, I work on personal and professional projects, in addition to teaching programming to children and offering services as a freelancer.
personal_info.location: San Antonio de Areco, Buenos Aires
personal_info.extraData: Passionate about creating innovative digital experiences.

projects.name: ArecoBUS
projects.description: Project that compiles information from the different buses that operate in San Antonio de Areco.

projects.name: Klendar
projects.description: Klendar is an application to manage events in a simple way, inspired by Google Calendar.

projects.name: Sistema de registro
projects.description: This system allows you to load university users and allows you to filter by sex and also search by typing.
